name: Foolish Me
description:
Foolish Me: A Metroidvania Puzzle-Platformer in three parts.

There are loops that loop.
And loops that do not.

There are loops
that are too big to see.

And there are loops
that you can't come back from.

Controls - Controller (Recommended!)

Move: D-Pad
Jump: A (or X for Playstation controller)

Others explained in-game

Controls - Keyboard

Move: A/D or arrow keys
Jump: Space or W

Others explained in-game.
Please note that some keyboards can only handle a few inputs from letter keys at a time - if this is an issue, use the arrow keys for movement instead of W/A/D.

Known issues

Platforms can have issues with high frame rates -- if things seem to glitch out a lot, try running at 60hz.

Credits

Designed, programmed and created by @LeekAnarchism, @Foxlit and @Raeya.Sound and music by @LeekAnarchism
Original art by @Raeya
